basics.name: James Myers
basics.label: Programmer
intro: I created this site using React.js, C#, bootstrap, Axios, json, and other technologies to showcase my skills and extensive background in the software development industry.
basics.summary: Software development professional with 20 years of Information Technology experience in the healthcare, telecommunications and accounting industries.  Strong emphasis on development and implementation of new technologies and API’s.
highlights: Demonstrated ability to manage and develop new functionality to increase client revenues and improve the customer experience
Strength in building relationships at the management level and facilitating communications across client and technical teams to identify and deliver solution
Proven track record in learning new development languages and adapting to new technologies
Experienced in SaaS and Agile development methodology

work.summary: Focused on maximizing customer satisfaction, retention and growth by building strong customer relationships, driving value reinforcement and adoption of products and services, and managing technical teams to deliver integration solutions.
highlights: Central point of contact for Fortune 500 customers with a combined ARR of $10MM, serving as the escalation point for success resolution of operational issues
Responsible for program and technical account management, creates and maintains operational controls and tracks performance metrics and delivery schedules
Leads all program/project meetings and client business reviews

work.summary: Responsible for the design, development and support of a consumer facing healthcare application in a LAMP stack environment
highlights: PHP Full Stack Developer
Working with a digital sign partner, architected a solution to displaying ads in the core application
Migrated applications to new PHP MVC model
Used Docker, AWS, GIT, Bitbucket and WordPress to design and develop custom solutions for clients
Created new queries and data manipulations using MySQL for testing and upgrading

work.summary: Responsible for the design, development and support of the healthcare revenue cycle management application
highlights: C# .NET Full stack developer
Used Mirth and SQL stored procedures to integrate HL7 messages from Epic, Cerner, Allscripts, MediTech and other registration, EMR, and Billing systems into the application
Modified and developed new and existing functionality using Visual Studio 2015 (C# and JavaScript)
Customized MicroStrategy to integrate with LDAP platform using java plugins to validate users and access control
Worked with BI team and customers to architect dashboards and metrics for healthcare data
Determined HIPAA compliance for tracking user access of PHI during reporting
Developed application solutions compatible with multiple versions of Windows and Chrome platforms
Used agile methodologies to estimate story points for development sprints

work.summary: Contract development engineer responsible for day to day support and development of new system functionality.
highlights: Developed, tested and implemented provisioning functionality for wireless and landline telephone voicemail service, switch interfaces, radius servers, ISP cable and alarm service platforms
Performed reconciliation audits and implemented fixes across multiple platforms

work.summary: Reporting to the VP of Switch Engineering managed a team responsible for the design, development and implementation of Switch Engineering applications
highlights: Promoted to manager, responsible for build ing and lead ing a team to migrate the legacy system to a Java/Oracle NextGen system. Oversight and ma nagement of all R&D and implementation for project

Lead the team responsible for developing and maintaining switch provisioning programs for Ericsson Lucent Motorola and Northern Telecom switches and provisioning programs for Glenayre and Lightbridge voice mail platforms
Designed and developed new applications to improve the platform performance and customer experience
Awarded 'Volunteer of the Month'

testimonials.text: I have known James professionally for nearly twenty years. I have worked with him at two companies. James is very versatile in his skills and willing to help the organization move forward. At Verisign, James was one of the main developers and support team members for the wireless provisioning application. The main function of this area of the system provisioned wireless subscribers into the switch to activate or deactivate wireless telephone service in real-time. The application also managed the subscriber call detail records. James and I also worked together at Ingenious Med (IM). James was a senior member of the Reporting and Data Warehouse application when he arrived at IM. He designed and implemented the security portion of the application. He was also a member of the application architecture team and later worked as part of the Integration team. He is always willing to do what is needed to keep the application moving forward. His technical skills are a true asset as well as his knowledge and experience. As the CTO at Ingenious Med, I was happy to have James as part of the Technical team and appreciated his contributions very much.
James is a very talented business and technical leader. We used to say 'he is a one-may IT shop'. He has tremendous skills and has always been a solid leader.
testimonials.user: Lee Huggins - SVP, Total Software Solutions
